details.short_description: Interest free loans for making businesses more energy efficient
details.eligibility: SMEs that have been trading for at least 12 months are eligible to apply.
details.additional_information: In England, this is part of the Solutions for Business Improving Your Resource Efficiency product.
details.contact_details: Carbon Trust customercentre@carbontrust.co.uk 0800 085 2005 Customer Centre PO Box 89 Witney OX29 4WB
details.body: The Energy Efficiency Loan scheme offers small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) loans to enable them to replace or upgrade equipment with more energy efficient versions.
